innerText: 843-4.Atthipaṭiccaṃnāmāti atthitā paṭiccattho nāma, asatipi sahajātapurejātādibhāve yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, so tassa paccayoti katvā yathā tathā atthitāmattaṃ idha paṭiccatthoti attho. Taṃ pana paṭiccatthaṃ byatirekamukhena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ‘‘yathā’’tiādimāha. Tattha nissayādipaccayabhāvena paṭiccāti vuttanti nissayādipaccayabhāvato paccayabhūtaṃ cakkhādi ‘‘paṭiccā’’ti vuttaṃ.
